titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent, and to increase to 100 percent, the deduction of self-employed individuals for health insurance costs.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1739)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 2/17/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent, and to increase to 100 percent, the deduction for the health insurance costs of self-employed individuals.
